description:
Due to enemy interference, their ship explodes! Kaito and the others are expelled from cyberspace and are scattered across Tohoku. Mitsuo, Fukuta, Boochokkin, and Ryouma join up and search for Kaito. Then a mysterious ghost appears and everyone panics! Elsewhere, Nagare discovers Sekito passed out, and then Himuro appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 漂流 ￥ 集まれガッポリカンパニー!!
